verses.verse: Let every <S%G3956><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> be subject <S%G5293><s%> unto the higher <S%G5242><s%> powers. <S%G1849><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> of <S%G575><s%> God: <S%G2316><s%> <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> powers <S%G1849><s%> that be <S%G5607><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> ordained <S%G5021><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Whosoever therefore resisteth <S%G498><s%> <S%G5620><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> power, <S%G1849><s%> resisteth <S%G436><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ordinance <S%G1296><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> they that resist <S%G436><s%> shall receive <S%G2983><s%> to themselves <S%G1438><s%> damnation. <S%G2917><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> rulers <S%G758><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a terror <S%G5401><s%> to good <S%G18><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> but <S%G235><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> evil. <S%G2556><s%> Wilt <S%G2309><s%> thou then <S%G1161><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> be afraid <S%G5399><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> power? <S%G1849><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> that which is good, <S%G18><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thou shalt have <S%G2192><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the same: <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> the minister <S%G1249><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to thee <S%G4671><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> good. <S%G18><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> thou do <S%G4160><s%> that which is evil, <S%G2556><s%> be afraid; <S%G5399><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he beareth <S%G5409><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sword <S%G3162><s%> in vain: <S%G1500><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> the minister <S%G1249><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> a revenger <S%G1558><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> execute wrath <S%G3709><s%> upon him that doeth <S%G4238><s%> evil. <S%G2556><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> ye must needs <S%G318><s%> be subject, <S%G5293><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> wrath, <S%G3709><s%> but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> for conscience sake. <S%G1223><s%> <S%G4893><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> for this cause <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> pay <S%G5055><s%> ye tribute <S%G5411><s%> also: <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%> ministers, <S%G3011><s%> attending continually <S%G4342><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> this very thing. <S%G5124><s%> <S%G846><s%>

Render <S%G591><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> their dues: <S%G3782><s%> tribute <S%G5411><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> tribute <S%G5411><s%> is due; custom <S%G5056><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> custom; <S%G5056><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> fear; <S%G5401><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> honor. <S%G5092><s%>

Owe <S%G3784><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> any thing, <S%G3367><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> to love <S%G25><s%> one another: <S%G240><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he that loveth <S%G25><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> hath fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> the law. <S%G3551><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> this, <S%G3588><s%> Thou shalt not <S%G3756><s%> commit adultery, <S%G3431><s%> Thou shalt not <S%G3756><s%> kill, <S%G5407><s%> Thou shalt not <S%G3756><s%> steal, <S%G2813><s%> Thou shalt not <S%G3756><s%> bear false witness, <S%G5576><s%> Thou shalt not <S%G3756><s%> covet; <S%G1937><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> if there be any <S%G1536><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> commandment, <S%G1785><s%> it is briefly comprehended <S%G346><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> saying, <S%G3056><s%> namely, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Thou shalt love <S%G25><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> thyself. <S%G1438><s%>

Love <S%G26><s%> worketh <S%G2038><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> ill <S%G2556><s%> to his neighbor: <S%G4139><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> love <S%G26><s%> is the fulfilling <S%G4138><s%> of the law. <S%G3551><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> that, <S%G5124><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> time, <S%G2540><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> it is high time <S%G5610><s%> to <S%G2248><s%> awake <S%G1453><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> sleep: <S%G5258><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is our <S%G2257><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> nearer <S%G1452><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> we believed. <S%G4100><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> is far spent, <S%G4298><s%> <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> is at hand: <S%G1448><s%> let us therefore <S%G3767><s%> cast off <S%G659><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> of darkness, <S%G4655><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> let us put on <S%G1746><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> armor <S%G3696><s%> of light. <S%G5457><s%>

Let us walk <S%G4043><s%> honestly, <S%G2156><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day; <S%G2250><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> in rioting <S%G2970><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drunkenness, <S%G3178><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> in chambering <S%G2845><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wantonness, <S%G766><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> in strife <S%G2054><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> envying. <S%G2205><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> put ye on <S%G1746><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> provision <S%G4307><s%> for the <S%G3588><s%> flesh, <S%G4561><s%> to fulfill the <S%G1519><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%> thereof.
